data.text: @bsmajithia Now u have alot of time

@bsmajithia Amlian de jarnail tent aala kamm karli aa k jija samose di rehri lau @officeofssbadal .  
Bacho ede to bas @BhagwantMann . Congratulations saanu aas hai hun, we feel safe now.

@bsmajithia U r now in your rightfull place and so is of people desiring to  meet you or you want to meet them, don't you worry if justice prevails, your extended family of well wishers may join to liven you up.

@bsmajithia How are your tweets becoming public. No other convicts/ undertrials have this privilege of tweeting and making these requests public @AmitShah @PMOIndia @PunjabPoliceInd @RupnagarPolice @DGPPunjabPolice #punjabjails @PIBHomeAffairs

@bsmajithia if punjab govt allow meetings ,its beter for mr channi ,honey n sukhi 
you r doing well for them.
@bsmajithia punhab govt should understand human emotions ,

Visits to prisoners by family is a solace in insulation. Since denial of visitation rights to prisoners amounts to adopting double-standards & is leading to an adverse effect on their mental health&emotional well-being, it calls for an imm restart of normal visitation rights.3/3
